duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead recruitment efforts, new hire orientation, and employee termination processes.
Manage payroll and benefits administration, ensuring compliance with company policy and procedures.
Build strong relationships with company managers to support their human resource needs.
Execute HR database transactions and facilitate employee engagement initiatives.
Partner with global teams to support mobility, visa needs, and compliance across multiple jurisdictions.
Analyze and recommend continuous process improvements and consult with key stakeholders.
Support the smooth onboarding and offboarding of employees and contribute to the design of HR initiatives.
Assist with payroll administration and reporting for the region, and work on other projects as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in Business, Human Resources, or related area (Master's preferred)
